name: netlify-local-plugins
description: This directory contains Build plugins that have been automatically installed by Netlify.
author: Netlify

scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const pkgPath=path.join(__dirname,'node_modules','html-minifier','package.json');if(fs.existsSync(pkgPath)){const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgPath,'utf8'));if(pkg.version==='4.0.0'){console.warn('WARNING: Vulnerable html-minifier 4.0.0 detected. Override should replace with html-minifier-terser.');}}"
